column1: MRI size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2, presenting the head of a man of 37 years old, with sagittal section. The observation is made on slice n°139 from the right hemisphere of the skull. We observe the brainstem of volume 510.2051 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4342.6758 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5264.2090 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 262.3535 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 582.7148 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1638.7207 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 477.2461 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 263.6719 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 7.9102 mm³, the right amygdala of volume 9.2285 mm³, the right nucleus accumbens of volume 63.2812 mm³ and the right ventral diencephalon of volume 193.7988 mm³ there.
